subsection.name: JAVA
subsection.p: Tested working with SUN v1.5.0_01 through v1.5.0_06 and 1.4.2_03.

subsection.name: Servlet container
subsection.p: The NutchWAX search webapp has been tested working in version 5.0.28 and 5.5.12 of tomcat.

subsection.name: xpdf: pdftotext
subsection.p: If parsing PDFs, you'll need xpdf installed on all slave host. Make sure xpdf if at least version 3.0 and that its in your PATH when NutchWAX is run.

subsection.name: Maven
subsection.p: If you want to build distributions and the website, you'll need Maven 1.0.2.
